WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed by commit 51795.If you are experiencing this issue, open the Item Editor and set the faction of this item to Neutral.
WorkItem.Description:
The item Barbed Ymirheim choker is not being displayed in item comparisons, although it is an outright upgrade for my attached xml. This may involve rawr.rogue as well.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch rawr.
2. Load XML file attached to this issue.
3. In comparisons, select slot: Gear/Neck and note that barbed ymirheim choker is not being shown.
   A. Addendum to this, if I disable all options in comparisons except for Dungeon (Heroics), the item is still not shown.
 
Additional Information: 
This bug is also reproducable in Rawr v3.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Barbed Ymirheim Choker not showing in comparisons

Comments.Message: Wierd, I can replicate this issue but I don't know what's causing it. I know the item is in the cache, and it has appropriate source data 'Drops from Forgemaster Garfrost in Heroic Pit of Saron' and stats but it just doesn't show up
Confirming issue.  Item is defaulting to "Faction: Alliance".
Ahhh I didn't think of that
Ok, verified that the problem isn't a parsing issue, refreshing the item from wowhead and armory and it stays neutral. It's just the ItemCache entry that's bad
